API_ID.description: api_id part of your Telegram API Key from my.telegram.org/apps

API_HASH.description: api_hash part of your Telegram API Key from my.telegram.org/apps

BOT_TOKEN.description: Bot token of Bot, get from @Botfather

LOG_CHANNEL.description: Create a log channel where bot is admin and send its ID

FORCE_SUB_CHANNEL.description: Send your main channel's ID to force members to join

ADMINS.description: ID of Users who can use Admin commands(for multiple users separated by space)
